about.content:
Hi, I'm Paul. I've been studying web design and development for over 5 years; after transitioning from video production.
                      I wanted to learn how to build dynamic multimedia driven websites for various projects I was involved in. The hobbie became an obsession and a drive to get better.
                      Web development can be puzzle like, and I really like puzzles.

I enjoy video production on my terms; when I'm not bound by the restriction of a client.
                      I'm a movement enthousiast and currently practice Parkour. Continued learning.
                      I watch video tutorials on web development and video production; for fun.
